title: Horrible Luck Lately (Hextech Crafting)
body:
I've got 12 chests, no keys, and my last **FOUR** chest openings have all been **champion shards**. Even worse, in those last four chests I got **TWO** {{champion:28}}  shards and **TWO** {{champion:17}} shards.

I thought I'd just share this as I'm curious to see what other players have gotten; so how has YOUR luck been recently?
